import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { decreasePage, getProducts, increasePage } from '../../store/ProductsSlice' getProducts import style from './Pagination.module.scss' export default function Pagination({num}) { let dispatch = useDispatch() let pageNumber = new Array(5).fill(1).map((e,index)=>index+1) return (
  • dispatch(decreasePage())}> «
    • {pageNumber.map((num,index)=>
  • dispatch(getProducts(num))} key={index}>{num}
    • )}
  • »
) }
